reviewText:
One of the tamest adult only videos ever.
I think anime like hs dxd was as revealing as this. That said the art was ok, however it was short and not much story.
I think for the cost it was a waste of money, maybe worth half the list price.
If you've read the manga, then you'll understand the low rating. This Anime was 6  Books unfortunately just sadly squeezed in to a 50 Minutes long show.

This is the English subtitled version of the OAV "Aki Sora In Dreams".  It is just a glimpse of the story as told in the manga.  You see scenes of Sora being with his sister Aki.  You see the torment Sora's other sister Nami goes through.  You see scenes of both Sora and Nami interacting with their school friend Kana and ultimately you see Nami attack Sora with a pair of scissors and then rape him.  This is basically a soft core porn anime.  It concentrates on the more graphic scenes from the manga and leaves a lot of Sora's pain and sorrow out.  Still it was enjoyable to watch.  I recommend it if you like this kind of thing.
It a good dvd but it has no episode 0 or english audio but on the but box it said english and japanese audio.
